hadith.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Rights will be given to their due, such that the hornless sheep would get its claim from the horned sheep." There are narrations on this topic from Abu Dharr and 'Abdullah bin Unais. [Abu 'Eisa said:] The Hadith of Abu Hurairah is a Hasan Sahih Hadith
